divs: sighting detailsi saw this driving home on state street. too low to be a plane or astronomical phenomenon. too high to be part of a boat. object was large. no movement, no sound. had a yellow color to it & a crescent shape (facing up). i lost it in the trees\houses. i was curious, yet not compelled to investigate. i had a strange feeling that i should just ignore it. it was not the moon. the moon was exactly at half that night.
